songs.name: Your Eyes Tell
songs.theme: There is light in the future that your eyes are seeing, even in difficult situations
songs.album: Map of the Soul: 7: The Journey

songs.name: Magic Shop
songs.theme: Open your hearts when you are in pain, and take away your fear; giving you back happiness by letting you know that you are not alone

songs.name: Mic Drop
songs.theme: All the achievements aquired coming from a small company with no real influence in the kpop world, directed towards the haters as they begin to become popular and win multiple awards
songs.composer: Bang Si-Hyuk, RM, J-Hope, Supreme Boi, and Pdogg

songs.name: Save Me
songs.theme: To have hope and never give up pleading for help and asking for salavation
songs.album: The Most Beautiful Moment In Life: Young Forever

songs.name: Dynamite
songs.theme: Make an effort to be happy during this difficult time dealing with the pandemic and lifting the mood by shedding light on the world when it is dark

songs.name: Black Swan
songs.theme: Look into the heart and dark shadows of each artist as they approach art aware of its potential destruction and working hard to overcome it
songs.composer: Pdogg, RM, Clyde Kelly, and August Rico
